test-set.name: method-xhtml
test-set.description: Tests for the Serialization method HTML

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-1
test-case.description: With html-version=4, empty elements are serialized using self-closing tags including a space

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-1a
test-case.description: With html-version=4, empty elements are not recognized if not in XHTML namespace

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-2
test-case.description: With html-version=5, empty elements are serialized using self-closing tags including a space, and are recognized when in no namespace

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868
created XHTML version of HTML serialization test
Relating to issue #28626: Removed the element command

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-3
test-case.description: Test that elements in the XHTML namespace whose local names match those of HTML 4.0 elements with empty content model are serialized as XML

modified.change: Added alternative result. See bug issue #21968
added dependency inline with bug issue #21868
created XHTML version of HTML serialization test

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-4
test-case.description: Test that elements in the XHTML namespace whose local names match those of HTML 5.0 elements with empty content model are NOT serialized using only a start tag

modified.change: added dependency inline with bug issue #21868
created XHTML version of HTML serialization test
bug 28626: allow whitespace in minimized tags

test-case.description: Test with cdata-section-elements for XHTML with html-version = 4.0

test-case.description: Test the XHTML serialization output method - empty map

test-case.description: Prefix normalization: XHTML namespace

test-case.description: Prefix normalization: SVG namespace

test-case.description: Prefix normalization: MathML namespace

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-57
test-case.description: Test the XHTML serialization output method - indent - whitespace not allowed at start or end of paragraph

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-58
test-case.description: Test the XHTML serialization output method - indent - whitespace not allowed before or after comment or pi

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-59
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 4.0

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-60
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 5.0

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-61
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 4.0: caseblind recognition

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-62
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 5.0 - caseblind recognition

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-63
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 5.0 - svg element

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-64
test-case.description: Test indenting of inline elements for HTML 5.0 - math element
test-case.test:
declare namespace output = "http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization"; declare option output:method "xhtml"; declare option output:indent "yes"; declare option output:html-version "5.0";
The Fraction @= a + b c + d 3 =@ may be real!

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-65
test-case.description: Test suppress-indentation for XHTML method

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-66
test-case.description: Test suppress-indentation for XHTML method
test-case.test:
declare namespace output = "http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization"; declare option output:method "xhtml"; declare option output:indent "yes"; declare option output:version "1.0"; declare option output:html-version "5.0"; declare option output:suppress-indentation "table";

One

yes

Two

yes

Three

yes

test-case.name: Serialization-xhtml-67
test-case.description: Test suppressing indenting of inline elements for XHTML 5.0 - math element
test-case.test:
declare namespace output = "http://www.w3.org/2010/xslt-xquery-serialization"; declare namespace math = "http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"; declare option output:method "xhtml"; declare option output:indent "yes"; declare option output:version "1.0"; declare option output:html-version "5.0"; declare option output:suppress-indentation "math:mrow math:mfenced";
The Fraction @= a + b c + d 3 =@ may be real!
